name.description: The friendlyName of the Studio Flow

path.description: The path to the file of the Flow Definition JSON

sid.description: (Optional) The sid of the existing Studio Flow resource

subflow.description: (Optional) Set to true if this flow is called by other studio flows

allowCreate.description: (Optional) Set to true to create the Studio Flow resource if it does not already exist

flows.description: The list of Studio Flows to deploy

replaceWidgetTypes.description: The list of widget types that can be updated on deployment

name.description: The unique name of the Functions Service

environmentSuffix.description: The URL environment suffix. Set to null for production

functionServices.description: The list of function service instances that are referred to by the studio flows

workflowMap.description: (Optional) Identifier (send-to-flex.attributes.workflowName) to Taskrouter Workflow sid map. If omitted, Friendly Name will be used as the identifier.

subflowMap.description: (Optional) Identifier (run-subflow.parameters.subflowName) to Studio Subflow sid map. If omitted, Friendly Name will be used as the identifier.

variableReplacements.description: Key-value pairs of replacements that should be done on set-variable widgets

enableShellVariables.description: Set to true to evaluate any $VARIABLE_NAME references in the configuration file with envsubst
